titleStmt.title: Augustus. Or, An essay of those meanes and counsels, whereby the commonwealth of Rome was altered, and reduced unto a monarchy
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas] F[awcet] for Henry Seile at the Tygers head in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Identified as STC 957 on UMI microfilm reel 650.
Reproductions of the originals in Cambridge University Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 650 (Cambridge University Library copy) and at reel 1070 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).

place.placeName: the Tygers head in St. Pauls Church-yard
